name: time?
command:
const dateFns = require('date-fns@1.30.1');const offsets = [
    ['america', -6],
    ['greenland', -3],
    ['UTC', 0],
    ['europe', +2],
    ['asia', +7],
    ['oceania', +9],
];
const { addHours, getDay } = dateFns
print(offsets.map(([name, offset])=>`{y}${name}{/}: `+(addHours(new Date, offset).toISOString().slice(11,19))).join` `)
